I was born and raised in the Japan and then after finishing my degree in fine arts from the prestigious Design School of New York, I settled down in USA. After working with some top companies such as Apple, Google & Nike, I decided to Freelance as I didn't want my creativity to be stifled by corporate pressures. I was born and raised in the Japan and then after finishing my degree in fine arts from the prestigious Design School of New York, I settled down in USA. After working with some top companies such as Apple, Google & Nike, I decided to Freelance as I didn't want my creativity to be stifled by corporate pressures. For the last 3 years, I have had the pleasure of working with several startups.

I was born and raised in the Japan and then after finishing my degree in fine arts from the prestigious Design School of New York, I settled down in USA. After working with some top companies such as Apple, Google & Nike, I decided to Freelance as I didn't want my creativity to be stifled by corporate pressures. For the last 3 years, I have had the pleasure of working with several startups.

Exponent WordPress theme is insanely flexible and amazingly easy to use. This alone would be enough for a 5 star rating. On top of a great tool is even better customer support. Get started swiftly & easily by importing a demo of your choice in a single click.  Over 30 quality professionally designed pre-built website concepts to choose from.

Vector Website

Exponent WordPress theme is insanely flexible and amazingly easy to use. This alone would be enough for a 5 star rating. On top of a great tool is even better customer support.

Get started swiftly & easily by importing a demo of your choice in a single click.  Over 30 quality professionally designed pre-built website concepts to choose from. Build your website using a fully visual interface, using our revolutionary page builder.

Maecenas at justo id velit placerat molestie. Donec dictum lectus non odio. Cras a ante vitae enim iaculis aliquam. Mauris nunc quam, venenatis nec, euismod sit amet, egestas placerat, est.

Pegasus

Exponent WordPress theme is insanely flexible and amazingly easy to use. This alone would be enough for a 5 star rating. On top of a great tool is even better customer support.

Get started swiftly & easily by importing a demo of your choice in a single click.  Over 30 quality professionally designed pre-built website concepts to choose from. Build your website using a fully visual interface, using our revolutionary page builder.

Juice

Exponent WordPress theme is insanely flexible and amazingly easy to use. This alone would be enough for a 5 star rating. On top of a great tool is even better customer support.

Get started swiftly & easily by importing a demo of your choice in a single click.  Over 30 quality professionally designed pre-built website concepts to choose from.

Wanderlust

[/text][special_sub_title title_content= "By Dennis Adelmann" font_size= "22" title_color= "#000000" title_alignment= "center" max_width= "100" margin_bottom= "30" animation_type= "fadeIn"][text max_width= "" wrap_alignment= "left" animation_type= "fadeIn" ]
Branding / Web Design  / Identity  / Magazine
[/text][/one_col][/row][/section][section padding_top="90" padding_bottom="90"][row][one_half][text max_width= "" wrap_alignment= "left" animation_type= "fadeIn" ]

The Brief

Proin facilisis varius nunc. Curabitur eros risus, ultrices et dui ut, luctus accumsan nibh. Fusce convallis sapien placerat tellus suscipit vehicula. Ea mei nostrum imperdiet deterruisset, mei ludus efficiendi ei. Sea summo mazim ex, ea errem eleifend definitionem vim. Detracto erroribus et mea.[/text][/one_half][one_half][text max_width= "" wrap_alignment= "left" animation_type= "fadeIn" ]

What We Did

Kraft Coffee

\n

Exponent WordPress theme is insanely flexible and amazingly easy to use. This alone would be enough for a 5 star rating. On top of a great tool is even better customer support.

\n

Get started swiftly & easily by importing a demo of your choice in a single click.  Over 30 quality professionally designed pre-built website concepts to choose from.

Maecenas at justo id velit placerat molestie. Donec dictum lectus non odio. Cras a ante vitae enim iaculis aliquam. Mauris nunc quam, venenatis nec, euismod sit amet, egestas placerat, est.

Vector Website

Exponent WordPress theme is insanely flexible and amazingly easy to use. This alone would be enough for a 5 star rating. On top of a great tool is even better customer support.

Get started swiftly & easily by importing a demo of your choice in a single click.  Over 30 quality professionally designed pre-built website concepts to choose from. Build your website using a fully visual interface, using our revolutionary page builder.

Juice

Exponent WordPress theme is insanely flexible and amazingly easy to use. This alone would be enough for a 5 star rating. On top of a great tool is even better customer support. Get started swiftly & easily by importing a demo of your choice in a single click.  Over 30 quality professionally designed pre-built website concepts to choose from. Juice

Exponent WordPress theme is insanely flexible and amazingly easy to use. This alone would be enough for a 5 star rating. On top of a great tool is even better customer support.

Get started swiftly & easily by importing a demo of your choice in a single click.  Over 30 quality professionally designed pre-built website concepts to choose from.
